scripts.build: copyfiles --flat ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map ./wwwroot/css && copyfiles --flat ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js ./wwwroot/js && copyfiles --flat ./node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js ./wwwroot/js && node -e "require('fs').rename('./wwwroot/js/cdn.min.js', './wwwroot/js/alpine.min.js', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); })"
